What's Your Why: The Emotional Reason Behind Your Quit

Everyone who wants to quit has a main reason for doing so. This is your “Why,” and knowing yours is important as you begin a quit. In "What’s Your Why", we gather some of these inspiring stories. Visit this page often for new stories, and start thinking about your own “Why” for quitting.
